reviews.review_msg: This is not an easy class, the name "critical thinking" may sound like this class may be easy n chiller, but it's not. The prof was helpful, I had him as my TA as well, goes throught he material and helps understand the concept.

Very clear at explaining concepts and his lecture slides help a lot. That being said the course material itself is extremely boring and not at all what i was expecting. Has multiple multiple choice on his midterms.. just saying.
